sentence.Network_en: In his new career as a restaurateur he has blossomed and harvested many awards.
sentence.Network_cn: 转行经营餐饮之后，他在事业上大获成功并获得了许多奖项。

sentence.Network_en: The restaurateur keeps a journal every night.
sentence.Network_cn: 餐馆老板每天晚上都要认真地做日记帐.

sentence.Network_en: After six years on the stage, she moved to the US with her Japanese restaurateur husband.
sentence.Network_cn: 在那里演出6年之后, 她和开餐馆的丈夫一起搬去了美国.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 各种职业名称用英语写_百度知道 ... dishwasher-- 洗碗机 restaurateur-- 餐馆老板, 饭店主人 sous-chef-- 助理厨师.
Moony的烹饪烤箱书第 1 页 ::... ... Glant Meatball 巨大肉丸子 Restaurateur 餐厅老板 Fish and Chips 英式炸鱼薯条.

list.abs: Thom was born and raised in Brooklyn , New York , by an entrepreneur father , and a restaurateur mother .托姆是出生和长大，在纽约布鲁克林，由一位企业家的父亲，和一个餐馆的母亲。
restaurateurs requiring assistance with wine list creation .需要协助建立酒单的酒店及餐厅。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: French, from the verb restaurer (see restaurant)

entry.def: A restaurateur is a person who owns and manages a restaurant.

auth_sentence.content: Bob Egan, a New Jersey restaurateur and activist.

auth_sentence.content: Joanna, a young Burundian restaurateur, has had difficulties with construction.

auth_sentence.content: The restaurateur Drew Nieporent came over, a big bear in a tuxedo.
